name: Reflex (itch) (Michael Grime)
description:
Reflex is a aim-training game made in 10 hours using Unreal Engine 4. It is therefore a simple game, but I am proud of the progress I made in a short time. It was created completely from a blank C++ project and all the core features are created using the C++ API

Features:

- 2 game modes with 3 difficulties.

- Stat tracking after each completed round.

- Interactive widgets to control game without menus.

- A completed gameplay loop

Controls:

- WASD for movement

- Escape to open pause menu

- Left Click to shoot the targets

- CTRL + Right Click to interact with the wall widgets

- Enter to start the game
